name: UserStyles.org - Dark Centered
description:
Idea derived from http://userstyles.org/styles/19082
I liked the idea so came up with this...
All images embedded via URI so no pics to download...
Works for all of userstyles except for blog area...
Works better when used with widescreen monitor...
May have missed something; who knows?...If so, shout...
For Firefox only but if enough interested can add for Mac and/or other platforms...
additional_info:
* Changes to Main Page per site update...Misc color changes...Widened center area due to new sidebar...Sidebar on top in some pages, left on side in Styles area... -- 2.15.11 --

* Changes to Discussion Tree...Changes to code and attachment backgrounds...Other minor color edits...  -- 1.21.11 --

* Adjustment made for new discussion/forum area...Still more to do...  -- 1/9/11 --

* Adjustment to main page after Userstyles update.  Also added word-wrap to discussion area * -- 9/7/10 --

* Slight modification to #Comments code element to center in discussion area and to widen the Block so the code will actually fit * -- 8/22/10 --
